title._content: Image taken from page 243 of 'History of Bedford, New Hampshire, being statistics compiled on the ... hundredth anniversary of the incorporation of the town, May 19th, 1850 [by P. P. W., T. Savage and W. Patten]'

Contributor: PATTEN, William - of Bedford, New Hampshire Contributor: SAVAGE, Thomas - of Boston, Mass Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.d.7."
